summary: Pretoria, in South Africa, is where the government works and foreign embassies are located. It's known for its universities and research centers, like the University of Pretoria and the Council for Scientific and Industrial Research. The city is near a river and has beautiful mountains nearby. It's also famous for its jacaranda trees, which is why some people call it the "Jacaranda City." Pretoria was one of the host cities for the 2010 FIFA World Cup. Some people want to change its name to Tshwane, but not everyone agrees.
title: Pretoria
